rules_text:
Vigilance, lifelink
{T}, Pay X life: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.
rules_text2:
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Debonair Eclair: You gain 3 life.
When you sacrifice Debonair Eclair, until end of turn, whenever you gain life, each opponent loses that much life.
